About Bhavik Makhija

 

Hello, My name is Bhavik Makhija and I am currently a grade 12 student taking a computer science course. I have always been facisinated by technology and decided to learn to code as a hobbie. Since then I have become much more interested in this feild and hope to work in a computer science related feild in the future. This portfolio features all my learning through out the course and puts it on display.

 

These are some of my projects

< robot />

This is the first program I made in P5.js and it revolved around learning to use shapes

Demonstrates: Knowledge of shapes and of JS

< Game Cover />

This was my second ever p5 program and features me making a god of war cover page

Demonstrates: Knowledge of shapes, JS and animating with draw() function

< Wallpaper />

I made a wallpaper that changes on every single run and it also has some customizable interactions

Demonstrates: Knowledge of shapes, JS, variables, fucntions and random()

< Emoji Game />

This was my first ever game that I made which features you fighting evil emojis

Demonstrates: Knowledge of arrays, using media, functions, objects, parameters, loops and object interaction

< Meme Generator />

Memes are a growing part of our society so I created a program that generates memes and lets users customize them

Demonstrates: Knowledge of 2-D arrays, using media, functions, loops and DOM

< Connect 4 (new) />

A class rainy day game that I digitalized

Demonstrates: Knowledge of 2-D arrays, using media, functions, Objects, try catch statements, Object Interactions, loops, DOM and DOM manipulation
